speaker: Shadow Market
lines: You find stalls set up in a clearing off the trail.
Lanterns hang from hooks and throw steady light.
A hound sleeps on a rug beside a seller's feet.
You trade coin at the tables the same as anywhere.
A vendor offers a small glimmering charm.
At the center, a stump serves as a scale for small trades.
A crier rings a bell and calls the next buyer.
You look over the items and decide.

choices.text: Trade your twig bundle for something that fits your hand.
Buy a glimmer with a story you haven't told yet.
Leave before prices remember to rise.
